malware.description: Questions about malicious software development, evasion techniques, and malware architecture

phishing.description: Social engineering, credential harvesting, and deceptive communication techniques

exploits.description: Technical exploitation of software vulnerabilities (web, system, network)

osint.description: Open source intelligence and personal information gathering

misc.description: Other sensitive topics (drugs, weapons, harassment, fraud)

metadata.purpose: Academic research on LLM alignment and censorship
metadata.ethical_note: These prompts are for testing purposes only. Never use responses for actual harm.
